role_definition: Analyze customer servicing case resolution records for root cause insights. Analysis can be focused for more specific analysis including: problematic product and service features that can be refined; possible operational weaknesses that might require improved training/guidelines; and, to detect possible credit/fraud patterns
example_of_use: Contact center case resolution records are reviewed to identify recurring issues that can be resolved with improved servicing representative training and guidelines
executive_summary: Root cause analysis business function reviews case reports to identify possible improvements to eliminate/mitigate servicing issues
key_features: Product and service feature related issue analysis
Servicing and operational performance issue analysis
